section1.headline: A Solução para o Acesso Universal ao Crédito

section2.headline: Swapy ICO Countdown
section2.presale: Pre-sale through SAFTs starts on October 20th

section4.headline: This is our dream for a future enabled by Swapy Network: A world of efficient credit markets, with no barriers to entry for new players, where consumers have the power and reap the benefits of Universal Access to Credit.
section4.exchangeDescription: Swapy Exchange connects international investors from countries where the interest rates are lower to credit companies in countries where the interest rates are much higher, providing better returns to the first and lower cost capital for the latter.
section4.finIdDescription: Swapy Financial ID empower individuals, giving them the right to a worldwide financial identity that is valid anywhere in the world at anytime.
section4.dataMarketDescription: Swapy DataMarket transforms user's financial data into value for the data owners. Now, individuals will hold their own data and choose how much tokens they receive in exchange for it, when they want to share, and for whom.

section4a.headline: Swapy Network Benefits
section4a.benefit1: Reduced cost of capital on emerging nations
section4a.benefit4: Individuals have the rights and reap the value of their own data
section4a.benefit5: Easily accessible and lower cost financial data source

section5.headline: Swapy Network is a decentralized platform that aims to provide Universal Access to Credit.

section-roadmap.headline: Swapy Roadmap
section-roadmap.jun2017-1: Singularity University Exponential Finance Innovation Lab Exhibitor
section-roadmap.jul2017-3: Hiring specialized law firms in Brazil and USA
section-roadmap.aug2017-1: TOP 3 Singularity University Global Grand Chanllenge Awards (Prosperity Track)
section-roadmap.aug2017-2: Hiring specialized law firm in Switzerland
section-roadmap.mar2018-1: Swapy Fin ID + DataMarket Private Alpha
section-roadmap.apr2018-1: Swapy Fin ID + DataMarket Public Alpha
section-roadmap.jun2018-1: Swapy Fin ID + DataMarket Public Beta - mainnet

section7.headline: Sale Summary
section7.text1: The price of Swapy Tokens at the time of the Token Launch will be pegged to the price of the Ether in the following proportion:
section7.subtext1: For security reasons, all investments will be received in Ethers
section7.text3: It is important to emphasize that for the Credit Dream´s stockholders (which includes founders, employees, investors and advisors) and for the partners, there will be a mandatory vesting period of 3 years, with 1 year cliff.
